post.title: Custom avatar
post.body:
Something I noticed setting up this blog is that I couldn't easily change the avatar that appears over the blog title.

I eventually figured out how to do it. You'll have to go into the folder containing your blog and open the `all.css` file.

Search for `.left .avatar{` and replace the last object where it says image pixelated with:

```
 background-image: url('data:image/jpg;base64,____');
```

You'll have to convert your avatar image to base64 and replace `____` with the text (it will be rather long).

Secondly, to make sure everything looks ok, change `background-size:` to 100%.
